price: “Vidjet ćeš da ću strpljiv biti, ako Bog da”, reče Musa, “i da ti se neću ni u čemu protiviti.”
arabic: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرٗا وَلَآ أَعۡصِي لَكَ أَمۡرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla satajidunī in shāa al-lahu ṣābiran walā aʿṣī laka amran
